Player History
Drafted in 15th round, 226th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2018...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 6/25/2018 (Going to CIN: SS Clifford Brantner, RF Jc Salomon, P Ronald Diep. Going to STL: P Alfonso Rodriguez, CF Christopher Miller, P Bill Johnson)...
Injured on 4/27/2019 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 3/2/2020 (Going to CIN: RF Alonzo Alonso. Going to HOU: 3B Justin Tepper, CF Lawrence Sauter, P Ronald Diep, P Rueben Goodin)...
